summary.description:
A novel complete deconvolution method for dissecting heterogeneous samples using gene expression data.

CDSeq MATLAB code. CDSeq is a novel computational complete deconvolution method for dissecting tissue heterogeneity.

CDSeq: A complete deconvolution method for dissecting tissue heterogeneity.

Added data-dilution option to speed up the algorithm. We provided explaination in the manuscript which you can find on bioRxiv. Check out the demo.m in CDSeq_012 for details
summary.name: CDSeq
